Name: Data mining 7
About the game: Data mining 7 - casual colorful minimalist puzzle in which you have to collect all the files that are not corrupted to exit the closed circle. The player's goal is to collect all data files, avoiding obstacles and traps, after which the previously closed pass will open to pass the level. In Data mining 7: - 50 levels - Explosions - Traps - Portals - Decelerators - Accelerators - Colorful art - Cool Soundtrack - Achievements

Meta Description: Looking for information on Data mining 7? Check out the release date (Mar 15, 2019), developer insights from Blender Games, and a complete game summary.
